languages.text: "Так чего же мы ждем? Скорее зовите писаря, надо все увековечить, пока не забыли! Только пусть сделает меня более героической и могущественной, чтобы я выгодно выделялась на фоне остальных ваших спутников. Как думаете, сколько мы с вами негодяев перебили? Миллион наберется? Хрен с ним, пусть будет два!"

traits.locale_text: "Так чего же мы ждем? Скорее зовите писаря, надо все увековечить, пока не забыли! Только пусть сделает меня более героичной и могущественной, чтобы я выгодно выделялась на фоне остальных ваших спутников. Как думаете, сколько мы с вами негодяев перебили? Миллион наберется? Хрен с ним, пусть будет два!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many wastrels have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"
languages.original_text: "Так чего же мы ждем? Скорее зовите писаря, надо все увековечить, пока не забыли! Только пусть сделает меня более героической и могущественной, чтобы я выгодно выделялась на фоне остальных ваших спутников. Как думаете, сколько мы с вами негодяев перебили? Миллион наберется? Хрен с ним, пусть будет два!"

traits.locale_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many scumbags have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many scumbags have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"

traits.locale_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many scumbags have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many wastrels have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “那咱们还等什么呢？快叫个抄写员过来吧。咱们得趁着还没忘的时候，把这些故事都记下来！不过，得让我看起来更有英雄气概，更有力量。这样，和你其他的同伴相比起来，我才会显得是最厉害的那个。你觉得咱们已经干掉了多少个敌人？有没有一百万个？管它呢，就当有两百万吧！”
languages.original_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many wastrels have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"

traits.locale_text: “那咱们还等什么呢？快叫个抄写员过来吧。咱们得趁着还没忘的时候，把这些故事都记下来！不过，得让我看起来更有英雄气概，更有力量。这样，和你其他的同伴相比起来，我才会显得是最厉害的那个。你觉得咱们已经干掉了多少个敌人？有没有一百万个？管它呢，就当有两百万吧！”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many wastrels have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"

languages.text: «¿Y a qué esperamos? ¡Llame a un escriba para registrarlo todo antes de que lo olvidemos! Pero tendremos que hacerme parecer más heroica y poderosa para que dé la talla junto a sus demás compañeros. ¿A cuántos patanes diría que hemos despachado? ¿A un millón? ¡No, que sean dos!».
languages.original_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many wastrels have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y a qué esperamos? ¡Llame a un escriba para registrarlo todo antes de que lo olvidemos! Pero tendremos que hacerme parecer más heroica y poderosa para que dé la talla junto a sus demás compañeros. ¿A cuántos patanes diría que hemos despachado? ¿A un millón? ¡No, que sean dos!».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「なら、何を待っているの？ここに書記官を呼んでちょうだい。忘れる前にすべて書き留めておかなくちゃ！だけど、他の仲間に負けないように、あたいをもっと英雄的に、強くしなければならない。何人の荒くれ者を殺したと思う？100万人かしら？そんなところでしょうね。それを2人分にしましょう！」
languages.original_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many wastrels have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"

traits.locale_text: 「なら、何を待っているの？ここに書記官を呼んでちょうだい。忘れる前にすべて書き留めておかなくちゃ！だけど、他の仲間に負けないように、あたいをもっと英雄的に、強くしなければならない。何人の荒くれ者を殺したと思う？100万人かしら？そんなところでしょうね。それを2人分にしましょう！」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Worauf warten wir dann? Holt einen Schreiber, wir müssen alles festhalten, ehe wir es vergessen! Wir müssen mich aber heldenhafter und stärker machen, damit ich neben Euren anderen Gefährten wie die beste wirke. Was glaubt Ihr, wie viele Taugenichtse haben wir abgeschlachtet? Eine Million? Ach, Unsinn, bestimmt zwei!"
languages.original_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many wastrels have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"

traits.locale_text: "Worauf warten wir dann? Holt einen Schreiber, wir müssen alles festhalten, ehe wir es vergessen! Wir müssen mich aber heldenhafter und stärker machen, damit ich neben Euren anderen Gefährten wie die beste wirke. Was glaubt Ihr, wie viele Taugenichtse haben wir abgeschlachtet? Eine Million? Ach, Unsinn, bestimmt zwei!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Alors, qu'est-ce qu'on attend ? Faites venir un scribe avant qu'on oublie tout ! Mais il faudra rendre tout ça un peu plus héroïque pour que je brille plus que vos autres compagnons, hein. Combien de cloportes est-ce qu'on a massacrés, selon vous ? Un million ? Bah, on n'aura qu'à dire deux ! »
languages.original_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many wastrels have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"

traits.locale_text: « Alors, qu'est-ce qu'on attend ? Faites venir un scribe avant qu'on oublie tout ! Mais il faudra rendre tout ça un peu plus héroïque pour que je brille plus que vos autres compagnons, hein. Combien de cloportes est-ce qu'on a massacrés, selon vous ? Un million ? Bah, on n'aura qu'à dire deux ! »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Ee, daha neyi bekliyoruz o zaman? Getir bir kâtip hemen. Hafızamızdan silinmeden önce hepsini kâğıda dökmeliyiz! Ancak beni daha kahramansı ve güçlü gösterelim de diğer yoldaşlarına kıyasla en çok ben göz doldurayım. Sence nasıl gitsin? Kaç tane serseri öldürmüş olalım? Bir milyon iyi mi? Bir milyon kime yeter ya, iki yapalım onu!"
languages.original_text: "Then what are we waiting for? Get a scribe in here, we need to get all this down before we forget! But we have to make me more heroic and powerful so that I come out looking the best next to your other companions. What do you reckon — how many wastrels have we slaughtered? A million? Stuff that, let's make it two!"

traits.locale_text: "Ee, daha neyi bekliyoruz o zaman? Getir bir tane kâtip hemen. Hafızamızdan silinmeden önce hepsini kâğıda dökmeliyiz! Ancak beni daha kahramanvari ve güçlü gösterelim de diğer yoldaşlara kıyasla en çok ben göz doldurayım. Sence nasıl gitsin? Kaç tane serseri öldürmüş olalım? Bir milyon iyi mi? Bir milyon kime yeter ya, iki yapalım onu!"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
